name: Adobe After Effects Graphic
summary: Learn about .AEGRAPHIC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Although AEGRAPHIC files are created by After Effects, they cannot be opened by After Effects. They can only be opened in Premiere Pro using the "Essential Graphics" panel.
NOTE: AEGRAPHIC files were introduced with the release of Adobe Creative Cloud (CC) 2017.

description: An AEGRAPHIC file contains a graphic created by After Effects, a motion graphics video program. It stores an animated graphic, which may include text, images, and video. AEGRAPHIC files are typically used for title or lower third overlays.
